DTMod:PactStone.NAME: Pact Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, you and Dragon gain #b

DTMod:MythicalSkillbook.NAME: Mythical Skillbook
DTMod:MythicalSkillbook.FLAVOR: Seems like a joke to tease non-expert programmer.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card that affects both you and another character, gain #b1 #yythical:Bonding.

DTMod:BasicTextbook.NAME: Basic Textbook
DTMod:BasicTextbook.FLAVOR: Basic skills are the most important things to learn.
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the damage and Block from basic Strikes and Target Defenses by #b
